title: Beautiful And Private Apartment Home Waiting Just For You!
posting_body: Call Today To Schedule A Tour!
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 650 Sq.
Karbon Apartments in Newcastle, Washington offers stylish living just minutes from the Newcastle Shopping Center, or an easy commute to Downtown Bellevue.
For people looking for an active and balanced lifestyle, our community combines the convenience and choices of urban living with the comfort of a small town community.
Our residents live, work, shop, as well as commute easily to the best jobs in the Pacific Northwest.
All of our studio, one and two bedroom apartments feature sleek stainless steel appliances, contemporary two tone cabinetry and brushed nickel finishes for a modern look.
Just outside your door you'll find plenty of amenities: off-leash dog park, a beautiful clubhouse with a pool table, fitness studio, and controlled access parking garage.
All while being close to lush natural walking trails and parks.
Stop by for a tour today!

Renovated Kitchen and Bathroom, Cable/Internet Ready, Garbage Disposal, Custom Cabinetry, Lush Carpeting, Vinyl Wood Plank Flooring, Breakfast Bar, Washer & Dryer in Home, Microwave, Stainless-Steel Appliances, Individual Hot Water Heaters, Private Balcony, Large Bedrooms, Satin-Nickel Finishes

Common Area WiFi, 24-Hour Maintenance Request Submittals, BBQ Grill, 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance, Courtesy Patrol, 24-Hour Package Lockers with Amazon HUB, On-Site Dog Park, 24-Hour Fitness Center, Easy Access to I-405, Online Payments Accepted, Fire Pit Lounge, Resident Lounge/Game Room, Controlled Access Parking Garage, Pet-Friendly
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
